body:
Comment 2 by **elazarl**: 
peter, I'm not sure. Do you also have as in the path? But changing the patch to look for
ed as well is trivial. Apply the patch and add ed to the line

- for TOOL in "$CC" as bison; do
+ for TOOL in "$CC" as bison ed; do

Actually the best patch will be listing all tools which are used during installation.
